review: I like this movie because it has a proper family movie which has lots of comedy, drama, love and friendship.I love rani mukherjee a lot and her acting too, she really acted well in the movie. Its a kind of rajshri movie types. In the second half , Pretty zinta is seen in the movie and story line changes from there a lot. I love this movie and recommend it to everyone to watch it and rate 4.3/5.
